raw_comment: I noticed that the southern states receive leaves before the northern states do, why is that? Does it work the same way as it does with snow? Seeing that northern states display more snow before the southern states do. And how do they know where the leaves may be in May?
ace_sentences: I noticed that the southern states receive leaves before the northern states receive leaves.
I ask why the southern states receive leaves before the northern states receive leaves.
I ask whether this works in the same way as snow works.
I noticed that the northern states display more snow before the southern states display more snow.
I ask how people know where the leaves may be in May.
